hymn.title: Jesus triumphant when the storm-clouds break
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By the Lord's Triumph

lyrics.stanza: Jesus triumphant when the storm-clouds break, And the loud thunder bids the soul awake; When biting blasts lay earthly projects low, And one by one the fondest treasures go.
Jesus triumphant, when in work for Thee, Sad and disheartened, no results we see; When gathered force of evil seems to win, And work for Christ seems lost in work of sin.
Jesus triumphant when the spirit wings Onward and upward to the King of kings; And through the last great triumph of Thy grace Triumphant saints shall see Thee face to face.
